text: is a 2007 anime film made by Makoto Shinkai. It is made up of three parts, "Cherry Blossom", "Cosmonaut" and "5 Centimeters per Second". The film is 65 minutes long. == Plot == The story takes place in Japan from the early 90s to 2008. ==Related pages== * Makoto Shinkai * Anime Category:2007 romantic drama movies Category:2007 animated movies Category:2010 manga Category:Internet memes Category:Japanese movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:Manga series Category:Science fiction anime and manga
title: 5 Centimeters per Second
